description:
Whether rocky terrain or rooty trails, the Ancash II promotes good stability and balance on demanding tours with a backpack. Its the sturdy upper that makes this possible. Thanks to its GORE-TEX lining, it keeps your feet dry even in mud and rain. Trekking fans with broader feet will appreciate the wide forefoot area.

Underfoot, the sure-grip Vibram® sole with its wide, stabilising heel and high rubber rand round things off nicely.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Ancash II GTX - Mens
